original_text: This had always been God's purpose, from the beginning of all things. And it was our Lord Christ Jesus who made it happen.
korean_text: 곧 영원부터 우리 주 그리스도 예수 안에서 예정하신 뜻대로 하신 것이라

sentences.original_text: This had always been God's purpose
from the beginning of all things
And it was our Lord Christ Jesus
